wifen.server.network

Interface Server

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerImpl

    public interface Server
    Network service interface for handling incoming connections and forwarding events to registered listeners.
    Author:
    Konstantin Schaper (pbg2h14ash)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptConnections()
      Starts waiting for incoming connection attempts.
      boolean addListener(ConnectionListener listener)
      Registers a listener for all upcoming ConnectionEvents that occur on any connection maintained by this server instance
      boolean addListener(ServerListener listener)
      Registers a listener for all upcoming ServerEvents fired by this Server.
      void broadcastPacket(Packet packet)
      Sends the given packet through all connections.
      java.util.List<Connection> getConnections() 
      boolean removeListener(ConnectionListener listener)
      Unregisters a previously registered listener.
      boolean removeListener(ServerListener listener)
      Unregisters a previously registered listener.
      boolean shutdown()
      Attempts to close all registered Connections and stop accepting connections.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptConnections

        void acceptConnections()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Starts waiting for incoming connection attempts.
        Does block the calling thread until the server is shutdown or any exception occurs.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • shutdown

        boolean shutdown()
        Attempts to close all registered Connections and stop accepting connections.
        The acceptConnections() method can still be called to start the server functionality again.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the server has been shut down correctly.

      • broadcastPacket

        void broadcastPacket(Packet packet)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sends the given packet through all connections.
        Parameters:
        packet - The packet to be sent
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When packet is null

      • getConnections

        java.util.List<Connection> getConnections()
        Returns:
        All currently registered connections

      • addListener

        boolean addListener(ServerListener listener)
        Registers a listener for all upcoming ServerEvents fired by this Server.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add
        Returns:
        Whether the listener has been added

      • addListener

        boolean addListener(ConnectionListener listener)
        Registers a listener for all upcoming ConnectionEvents that occur on any connection maintained by this server instance
        Parameters:
        listener - to add
        Returns:
        whether the listener has been successfully added

      • removeListener

        boolean removeListener(ServerListener listener)
        Unregisters a previously registered listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove
        Returns:
        Whether the listener was registered and has been successfully unregistered

      • removeListener

        boolean removeListener(ConnectionListener listener)
        Unregisters a previously registered listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove
        Returns:
        Whether the listener was registered and has been successfully unregistered
